name: Project: Yusha Prototype
description:
An evil witch put a curse on this world.

Your mission is to defeat that witch and save the world from curse.

But be careful, her hideout is filled with monsters.

Basic Controls(Keyboard):

Arrow keys : movement

Space bar: jump

Z: attack

X: throw item

A or S: switch item

Left Shift: dash

Esc: in-game menu

Controller recommended.

Controls for Controller is written in readme file.
